TenantSecurityAlertRuleSelectedTenant.name: TenantSecurityAlertRuleSelectedTenant
TenantSecurityAlertRuleSelectedTenant.description: Stores information about a Security Center alert rule for tenants.

Name.description: The name of the metric for the data collected.

NotificationRuleIdentifier.description: The ID of the corresponding TenantSecurityNotificationRule.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant (org) that this record is for.
